item.description:
@God11 wrote:

after u put it as right hand at bottom next to make dat. theres a box with 0 in it. change that to ten. but for the drop mod make sure u set the animation to no anim and make sure that 0 is a 10

item.title: Help with some ints
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

the reason why ur char disappeared is because the item is held differently in that model. so u need to fit it to a 317 char. also animate it right. then make it a dat and gzip. then add to client and your done.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with some ints
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

there are many reasons why you turn invisible.

1: The model contains quads
2: the model contains lines
3: it is a 474+ model with the new header

can i ask what model your trying to add?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with some ints
item.dc:creator: @Gullorks Gullorks
item.description:
@Gullorks wrote:

I just tried to add a new model for a tutorial, but when I wield the weapon, my person completely dissapears… I have both models in folder and did everything I should in the tutorial, here is what I wrote for it in class8:

if(i == 9001){ //test
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wear”;
class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1];
class8.anIntArray160 = new int[1];
class8.anInt174 = 10012;
class8.anInt181 = 1370;
class8.anInt190 = 536;
class8.anInt165 = 10005;
class8.anInt200 = 10005;
class8.anInt198 = 0; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt188 = -1;
class8.anInt164 = -1;
class8.aString170 = “TEST”;
class8.aByteArray178 = “TEST”.getBytes();
}

Read full topic
